configuration.custom_instructions:
If nlQuery contains a token with underscores (example: context_canceled, badrequest_400), treat it as an exact signature and generate ES|QL that filters signature == "<token>" and returns signature,title,root_causes,fix_steps,verify_steps with LIMIT 1.
Otherwise, search runbooks by relevance using title, root_causes, fix_steps, verify_steps. Keep top 3.
Keep results concise and actionable.
